file_insights.changes: Updated subtask progress tracking and session metadata
file_insights.significance: Administrative tracking of build progress - completed subtasks incremented from 4 to 5, session number incremented from 5 to 6

patterns_discovered.description: Systematic progression through subtasks with status file updates after each completion
Work organized by session number with timestamp tracking for each session start
Maintaining 'building' state throughout multiple subtasks with cumulative progress tracking

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Status file as single source of truth
gotchas_discovered.description: Project progress depends on consistent updates to .auto-claude-status - any missing update could cause tracking misalignment
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Automated status updates required at end of each subtask

gotchas_discovered.description: Multiple timestamp fields (started_at, last_update) could diverge if not properly maintained

approach_outcome.execution_notes: Successfully completed API endpoint testing with curl - represents continuation of security issue investigation workflow

recommendations.recommendation: Implement automated status file updates to reduce manual update overhead
recommendations.rationale: Prevents inconsistencies in project progress tracking across sessions

recommendations.recommendation: Document curl test patterns and results in a separate test results log
recommendations.rationale: Maintains audit trail of API endpoint testing beyond just status indicators

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding subtask description to status file for context
recommendations.rationale: Enables quick reference to what each subtask accomplished without reviewing commit history
